Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Rings
Description: Three rings of excellent craftsmanship. The first one has a diametre of 2,8 cm, the second is 1cm in diametre and the third 1,3 cm in diametre. All three are open. The largest has a thickness of 0,4 cm whereas the other two are 0,3 cm thick. Irregular diamond-shaped cross-sections.
